name: Synthesis
description: You regenerate from the inside, healing some of your wounds. Heal yourself for 1d12 + MOVE hit points. If activated in harsh sunlight, double the healing dice.
higherLevels: The healing dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 2d12 at level 10, and 6d6 at level 17.

contest.effect: Effectiveness varies depending on when it is used.
